rules.description: Change [caps_lock key] to [control+option+shift], if pressed alone -> caps_lock key
かなキーMode Trigger [[ かなキー ] as trigger key]
かなキーMode [arrow keys], [u -> delete], [o -> delete_forward], [enter -> exit], [u -> tab]
英数キー Trigger [[ 英数キー ] as trigger key]
英数キーMode [left_shift -> ko],　[x -> fn], [z -> かなキー], [edsf -> arrowkeys]
Numeric Keypad Trigger [Tab as trigger key]
